item.description: Come to the beach party at Gail Fuller’s beach cottage at Sound View, Old Lyme starting at 3 pm. Don’t miss out, join us! This is sure to be a great time. You can visit, hang out, or just walk on the beach. For the picnic, bring a salad, entree, or dessert. Admission $10. If you don’t want to bring food, cost $15. To reserve, call Gail in Bristol 860-582-8229 or Old Lyme 860-434-6426. Directions to 46 Swan Avenue: Rt. 9S to I‑95N, just over bridge take Exit 70, ramp end turn right onto Rt. 156, go about 5 miles, right after Citgo gas station, take right onto Swan Ave. after 1st stop sign, 3rd house on left. You cannot park on street. When you reserve, you’ll receive information on where to park.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Summer Beach Party
